DOC.brief_summary: The study is designed to evaluate whether daily insulin treatment to weight losing cancer patients attenuates progression of cancer cachexia and improves metabolism.
DOC.detailed_description: Randomized study with long-term follow-up based on survival, health related quality of life, food intake, resting energy expenditure, body composition, exercise capacity and measurement of metabolic efficiency.
DOC.criteria: Weight loss Systemic solid cancer Diabetes Brain metastases Expectant survival of less than 6 months Serum creatinine above 200 umol/l Persistent of recurrent fever Cholestasis
